p: The training protocol consisted of four weeks of aerobic training (walking and/or running on an ergometric treadmill), three times per week, lasting 60 min, of moderate intensity (50% to 70% heart rate reserve) [ 18]. A one mile field test was performed prior to the protocol to estimate the maximum oxygen consumption and to obtain the maximum heart rate [ 19]. The heart rate of training was determined based on the reserve heart rate [ 20], monitored by Polar Â® frequency meter model M200 (Polar Electro, Kempele, Finland), and supervised by rating of perceived exertion [ 21].
